Title: Beholder BeholdTV tuner API
Description: This is unofficial Beholder BeholdTV tuner API for C# developers.
HomeWiki:
Overview

This project provides managed API for BeholdTV tuners Remote Control. And small example of usage.
Project is based on BeholdTV.dll library.
